analysis.description:
Profiterole.distributeBonuses (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#855-882) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- firstDepositDate == 0

EmissionProvider.distributeBonuses (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1342-1352) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _balance == 0

Reentrancy in Profiterole._withdrawBonusesFromDeposit (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#917-955):
	External calls:
	- _sharesPercent = _treasury.getSharesPercentForPeriod(_userKey,_periodDate) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#932-934)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- distributionDeposits (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#953-955)

Object.withdrawnTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#102-112) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(token).transfer(_to,balance) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#111)

Profiterole.distributeBonuses (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#855-882) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Treasury(treasury).addDistributionPeriod() (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#879-880)

Profiterole.getTotalBonusesAmountAvailable has external calls inside a loop:
	- _sharesPercent = _treasury.getSharesPercentForPeriod(_userKey,_startDate) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#794-797)

Reentrancy in EmissionProvider.EmissionProvider (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1152-1173):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(Profiterole(_profiterole).bonusToken() == _bonusToken) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1164-1167)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusToken (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1167)
	- endDate (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1169)
	- needInitialization (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1173)
	- profiterole (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1168)
	- startDate (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1168)
	- token (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1167)
	- tokenHardcapValue (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1170-1171)
	- tokenSoftcap (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#1169)

Reentrancy in Profiterole.distributeBonuses (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#855-882):
	External calls:
	- ! _bonusToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,wallet,_amount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#867-869)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- distributionDeposits (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#874-875)
	- distributionDeposits (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#878-879)
	- firstDepositDate (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#872)
	- lastDepositDate (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b73bf62c2b433c6df0070792eef04347614a0a4.sol#877-878)
